message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_PREV_SERVICERATE_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be after the Start Date of the previous service rate, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_FROM_DATE_AFTER_NEXT_SERVICERATE_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be later than or equal to the Start Date of the next service rate %1d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_SERVICEOFFERING_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date of the service offering %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_FIXED_AMOUNT_MIN_AMOUNT_MAX_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: A Fixed Amount or a Minimum and/or Maximum Amount must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MIN_AMOUNT_MAX_AMOUNT_NOT_REQUIRED_IF_FIXED_AMOUNT
message.locale: A Minimum or Maximum Amount cannot be entered along with a Fixed Amount.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MIN_AMOUNT_GT_OR_EQ_ZERO
message.locale: Minimum Amount must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MIN_AMOUNT_GT_ZERO_MAX_AMOUNT_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Minimum Amount must be greater than zero if Maximum Amount is not entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MAX_AMOUNT_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Maximum Amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_FIXED_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Fixed Amount must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MIN_AMOUNT_LT_OR_EQ_MAX_AMOUNT
message.locale: Minimum Amount must be less than or equal to the Maximum Amount.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MIN_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION_EMPTY_MIN_AMOUNT
message.locale: Minimum Amount Payment Option must be selected if Minimum Amount is entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MAX_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION_EMPTY_MAX_AMOUNT
message.locale: Maximum Amount Payment Option must be selected if Maximum Amount is entered

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_FIXED_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION_EMPTY_FIXED_AMOUNT
message.locale: Fixed Amount Payment Option must be selected if Fixed Amount is entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MIN_AMOUNT_EMPTY_MIN_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION
message.locale: Minimum Amount must be entered if Minimum Amount Payment Option is selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_MAX_AMOUNT_EMPTY_MAX_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION
message.locale: Maximum Amount must be entered if Maximum Amount Payment Option is selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XFV_FIXED_AMOUNT_EMPTY_FIXED_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_OPTION
message.locale: Fixed Amount must be entered if Fixed Amount Payment Option is selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MAX_AMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: Maximum Amount entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MIN_AMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: Minimum Amount entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_FIXED_AMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: Fixed Amount entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_LATER_END_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the service offering End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_MUST_NOT_ADD_RATE_CANCELED_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: You cannot add Service Rate to the canceled service offering.
You cannot add Service Rate to the cancelled service offering.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_NOT_LATER_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be later than service offering End Date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_XRV_MUST_NOT_MODIFY_INITIAL_SERVICERATE_START_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date of the initial service rate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICERATE_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_OFFERING_ID
message.locale: The Service for this Rate cannot be modified.
